item.scguns.gun_bench.desc: Currently only available as gunsmith villager's working station. Please use mechanical crafters to assemble guns.
item.kubejs.broken_snowcap_oven.desc: This furnace is broken! You have to repair it with raw froststeel in order to make it functional.
item.kubejs.asphalt.desc: Pour liquid asphalt onto the ground to make it soild and obtain asphalt block.
item.kubejs.steel_ingot_with_mold.desc: Molten steel is within this mold
item.kubejs.code_perfection.cooldown: You are already in your perfect form!
item.kubejs.music_disc_flame_over_the_ic: Midnight Pigeon - Flame over the Ice
item.kubejs.disc_fragment_yggdrasil.desc: Rarely found in chests of Blue Skies Dungeons
You can only see a faint line of text: Yggdrasil...
item.kubejs.amethyst_shard.desc: Emits echo when being close to skulk blocks...
item.kubejs.echo_shard.desc: Seems like a kind of mineral shard being corrupted by skulks...
item.kubejs.obelisk_base.desc1: You feel a strong power emitting from this block...
item.kubejs.obelisk_base.desc2: If you put it under the obelisk, then it will recieve infinite charge (but you cannot move the base after placement)
item.kubejs.diamond_gears.desc: Although this diamond gear seems to have an excellent capability, it is quite easy for it to be damaged and destroyed...
item.eclipticseasons.calendar.desc: Hang it on the wall to view the current ecliptic season!
